sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './RecipeDisplay.css' import star_icon from '../assets/velikonocni-cupcaky.jpg' import star_icon_dull from '../assets/velikonocni-cupcaky.jpg' import { useContext } from 'react' import { ShopContext } from '../../context/ShopContext' const RecipeDisplay = (props) => { const {recipe}=props; const {saveForLater}= useContext(ShopContext); return (

{recipe.name}

Kategorie: {recipe.category}

Zdroj receptu

Čas přípravy: {recipe.preparation_time} min
Počet porcí: {recipe.servings}
) } export default RecipeDisplay
